TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebProcessInformation extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供裝載 ASP.NET 之背景工作處理序的相關資訊。

span.span: Provides information about the worker process that hosts ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 健康監視，可讓生產環境和作業人員管理已部署的 Web 應用程式。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空間包含負責封裝應用程式健全狀況狀態資料，健康情況事件型別和提供者類型負責處理此資料。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data, and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它也會包含有助於管理健全狀況事件的支援型別。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 執行個體類別包含使用任何衍生自類型取得的資訊型別。Instances of the class contain information that is obtained using any of the types derived from the type. 您的應用程式需要存取受保護的資訊，此類型所提供的適當權限。Your application needs the appropriate permissions to access protected information provided by this type. 下列範例是您可以使用包含處理序資訊的記錄檔錯誤事件啟用 ASP.NET 組態檔的摘要。The following example is an excerpt of the configuration file you could use to enable ASP.NET to log error events that contain process information. ``` ``` > [!NOTE] > 在大部分情況下您將實作時，使用 ASP.NET 健康監視類型，您會指定中的值，以便控制健全狀況監視系統`healthMonitoring`組態區段。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 您也可以衍生自健全狀況監視的型別，來建立您自己的自訂事件和提供者。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 如需建立自訂的事件類別的範例，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節。For an example of creating a custom event class, see the Example section. ## Examples 下列範例有兩個部分。The following example has two parts. 第一個是可讓 ASP.NET 使用自訂的事件，會使用組態檔的摘錄型別。The first is an excerpt of a configuration file that enables ASP.NET to use a custom event that uses the type. 第二個示範如何實作自訂的事件。The second shows how to implement the custom event. 請確定您的自訂事件會引發在適當的時間，也就是會引發取代相等的系統健康狀態事件時。Ensure that your custom event is raised at the proper time, that is, when the equivalent system health event it replaces would be raised. ``` ``` 下列範例示範如何實作自訂事件使用型別。The following example shows how to implement a custom event that uses the type. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebProcessInformation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebProcessInformation/CS/webprocessinformation.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebProcessInformation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebProcessInformation/VB/webprocessinformation.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AccountName As String
public: property System::String ^ AccountName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得背景工作處理序的帳戶名稱。

span.span: Gets the account name for the worker process.

value.span: 背景工作處理序帳戶名稱。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您的應用程式需要適當的權限來存取這個屬性所提供的資訊。Your application needs the appropriate permissions to access the information provided by this property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何取得處理序帳戶名稱。The following example shows how to obtain the process account name. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebProcessInformation#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebProcessInformation/CS/webprocessinformation.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebProcessInformation#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebProcessInformation/VB/webprocessinformation.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void FormatToString(class System.Web.Management.WebEventFormatter formatter) cil managed

param.name: formatter
param.span: 包含用來將 Web 健康情況事件資訊格式化之定位和縮排設定的 。

span.span: The that contains the tab and indentation settings used to format the Web health event information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會提供統一的格式如事件資訊，這非常有用，如果事件資料必須記錄，並向使用者顯示更新版本。The method provides a uniform format for event information, which is useful if the event data must be logged and later presented to the user. 當提供者會叫用的其中一個方法會在內部呼叫方法。The method is called internally when the provider invokes one of the methods. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定自訂資訊的格式。The following example shows how to format custom information. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebProcessInformation#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebProcessInformation/CS/webprocessinformation.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebProcessInformation#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebProcessInformation/VB/webprocessinformation.vb#7)]

public: property int ProcessID { int get(); };
